amendment.description: An amendment numbered 44 printed in Part B of House Report 116-119 to prohibit the use of funds for use by NOAA to implement any changes to the regulations that govern the federal consistency and appeals process under the Coastal Zone Management Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Huffman amendment (A017) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A017) offered by Mr. Huffman.
